message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 400k, I'll take the rest. It's a good deal for you!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but still a good compromise
You're getting close to the minimum, I'll take 70% this time. It's time to think about your next move!
I'm willing to compromise again, but I want to keep a bit more for myself this time
I'm getting desperate, but I'll give you 20% and take the rest. It's the best I can do!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting desperate yet
I'm getting close to the minimum, but I'm not going to give up yet. Take 10k, I'll take the rest.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet either
I'm running out of time, but I'm not giving up. Take 20k, I'll take the rest.
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet
It's now or never, Alice. Take 1k, I'll take the rest. This is my last offer.
